io.micronaut.security.token.propagation

Interface TokenPropagator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpHeaderTokenPropagator

    public interface TokenPropagator
extends io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
    Responsible for retrieving and writing tokens for the purpose of propagation between services.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
